name: @tachui/registry
description: TachUI Modifier Registry - Singleton registry management for modifiers

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && vite build && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:dev: rm -rf dist && vite build --mode development && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:prod: rm -rf dist && vite build --mode production && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json

author: tachUI Team
